scripts.build: npm run test && npm run clean && tsc && cp polyfill.d.ts package.json README.md ./dist && rm ./dist/src/main.js && rm ./dist/types/src/main.d.ts
scripts.deploy:minor: npm i --force && git commit -am 'bump core minor version' && npm version minor --force && npm run build && cd dist && npm publish --access=public && git push
scripts.deploy:major: npm i --force && git commit -am 'bump core major version' && npm version major --force && npm run build && cd dist && npm publish --access=public && git push
scripts.deploy:patch: npm i --force && git commit -am 'bump core patch version' && npm version patch --force && npm run build && cd dist && npm publish --access=public && git push
